Wings: A full pound of hand breaded chicken wings served with korean bbq, buffalo, smoky sweet dry rub, bbq or spicy honey garlic sauce or try the Pemi Favorite - buffalo and dry rub together!
Chicken Tenders: tempura chicken tenders with buffalo, smoky sweet dry rub, bbq, korean bbq, or spicy honey garlic
Falafel: served with cucumber salad and herb yogurt
Fried Pickles: sour and crispy, served with buttermilk ranch
Irish Nachos: house fried potato chips, cheddar, bacon, fresh scallions, jalapenos, sour cream
GoGo Bites: deep fried bites filled with jalapenos, roasted corn, bacon & cream cheese, deep fried and served with BBQ drizzle
Pemi Dip: creamy bacon dip w/ a 3 cheese blend, whole grain mustard, caramelized onion and scallions served w/warm soft pretzel bites

Bowl of Chili: served with cheddar and green onion
Whipped Ricotta Caprese: whipped lemon ricotta, roasted tomatoes, olive oil and balsamic, mixed micro herbs
Roasted Apple Salad: arugula, roasted apples, papitas, pickled red onion, feta, maple dijon vinaigrette

subtitle: substitute a gluten free crust for $2

Public House: mozzarella, pesto, feta, sliced tomatoes, roasted garlic
BLT Flatbread: pemi dip base, bacon, tomatoes, romaine lettuce, spicy mayo drizzle
BBQ Chicken Flatbread: ranch, shredded chicken, mozzarella, cheddar, bacon, bbq, onions

subtitle: Served with hand cut fries and pickle.  Substitute side caesar salad for $2, truffle fries for $2. Add a side caesar salad, cup of soup or cup of chili to any Sandwich for $4. Substitute a gluten free roll to any sandwich for $2

Chicken Sandwich: grilled chicken w/ cheddar, bacon, lettuce, tomato & onion, garlic aioli. Served on a brioche roll
Lulu's Big Dog: quarter pound hot dog on grilled brioche bun with sautéed peppers & onions, stone ground mustard
Pemi Sliders*: 2 angus beef patties topped with cheddar, bacon, garlic aioli, lettuce & tomato, on grilled brioche.
Banh Mi: smoked pork, carrot, pickled cucumbers, jalapenos & fresh cilantro with spicy mayo, served on toasted french roll
Quinoa Burger: red quinoa, lentil and roasted garlic 'burger' with tomato jam, arugula, pickled red onion, feta and garlic aioli on brioche roll
Impossible Burger: plant protein based burger served on grilled brioche with lettuce, onion, and tomato

subtitle: Add a side caesar salad, cup or soup or cup of chili to any meal for $4

Chicken Caprese: marinated grilled chicken, roasted tomatoes, whipped ricotta, fresh mozzarella, balsamic reduction served w/baby potatoes and veg of the day
Baked Mac & Cheese: cavatappi pasta in three cheese sauce topped with buttered ritz crumbs.
Shepard's Pie: the Pemi’s twist on a classic - seasoned ground beef in a merlot gravy with carrots, peas and onions topped and baked with roasted garlic mashed potatoes
Tom's Chicken Pot Pie: all white meat, carrots, onion, peas, potatoes, topped with golden puff pastry
Falafel Plate: cucumber salad, herbed yogurt, warm naan
Street Corn Shrimp: marinated grilled shrimp served over a cheesy street corn topped with pico de gallo, pickled peppers, cotija cheese and fresh cilantro
Naan Tacos: adobo pulled chicken, cotija cheese, grilled peppers & onions, corn salsa, micro cilantro, lime sour cream on mini naan
Try it veg style! (sub black beans for chicken)
